name: EVA (itch) (Rawbroom)
description:
EVA is a top-down arcade game where you play as one of the captains who needs to save the space station from incoming enemies. Create walls around yourself to flee from galaxy to galaxy and save the day.

CONTROLS:

Drag your mouse in combination with the key displayed to create a wall.

INFO: 

Keep your streak up in order to increase your fire rate and unlock ability to explode monsters in chain reaction.
